canonical_text:
Title: Fund Security Audit for Xea Governance Oracle

Summary:
This proposal asks the DAO to allocate up to $30,000 from the treasury to pay an independent security firm to audit the Xea Governance Oracle smart contracts and related off‑chain components, improving security and trust in governance.
​
Details:
If approved, the core contributors will select a reputable auditor, share documentation and code, implement all critical fixes, and publish a brief public audit summary for the community within 8 weeks of funding.
​
